thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 4 of 1748
thread.title: Jeffrey

author: Jeffrey
title: Jeffrey
text:
I had a very knowledgeable representative present a number of expense saving options I was not aware of. This was time spent to my advantage, and satisfaction with FlightHub, not to their profitability. No pressure to purchase, simply presented less expensive alternatives and an itinerary that saved time and money in travel.
Simply explained, an excellent travel agent, not someone upselling every profit boosting product on their website. A very welcome experience.
